name: Juphoon System Software
overview: About Juphoon Juphoon is a brilliant developer of communication software, focusing on leading technology to design the perfect user experience. Over the past 7 years, we have accumulated vast experience in such fields as VoIP, IP Multimedia Subsystem (IMS), Rich Communication Suite (RCS and RCS-e), real-time multimedia communication and cross-platform (PC, Android, iPhone, iPad, Web), hence our stable and mature service framework for development. Our customers and partners come from all over the world, including many Global 500 companies such as HUAWEI, Alcatel-Lucent and China Telecom. Founded in 2005, Juphoon has grown to more than 30 employees, with headquarters in Ningbo and offices in Shanghai and Shenzhen.

offices.address1: Room 910, Floor 9, Building 2,  Shangdong International Building,  Jiangdong District
